abstract: New York Giants defense is struggling under new defensive coordinator Steve Spagnuolo, who returned to team after six-year absence; team is preparing for upcoming game against Atlanta Falcons.
lead_paragraph: Although the defensive coordinator’s second stint with the team cannot be assessed so soon, it is fraught with problems as the Giants face the explosive Atlanta Falcons on Sunday at MetLife Stadium.

headline.main: Giants’ Defense Off to a Slow Start in Steve Spagnuolo’s Return Engagement
headline.print_headline: Giants’ Defense Is Off to a Slow Start in Spagnuolo’s Return Engagement

snippet: Although the defensive coordinator’s second stint with the team cannot be assessed so soon, it is fraught with problems as the Giants face the explosive Atlanta Falcons on Sunday at MetLife Stadium.
